sub_title: Travel, Food and Wine writer. History, origin and execution of traditional and modern recipes.
summary:
FOOD WRITER
After many years of traveling throughout the world and eating out thousands of times in restaurants and on the street, I started to use my knowledge about good food by writing about food in local magazines and running three restaurants for a period of two years in Singapore. An English steakhouse, a temporary Australian and an Italian restaurant. Now, back in the Netherlands, I decided to combine my four passions in live, travel, food, photography and writing. I invent modern recipes for cookbooks, travel for food related articles and make pictures of places and dishes. If not published elsewhere, the results go on line on www.remcoosculiflowers.com, my Dutch food blog. 

Specialties: Travel, Food and wine Writing in Dutch and English including photography.

profile_positions.description: This blog is a funny Dutch foodblog about good food, origin of recipes, history of food and of course nice tasty recipes. Look at www.remcoosculiflowers.com!

profile_positions.description:
Working closely with the Regional President Services to develop and implement the company’s long term strategic plan, this role will take full strategic and day-to-day management responsibility for driving the development, future growth and success of   services in ASEAN for Lucent Worldwide Services (LWS).
As an ambassador and champion of the services business, I provided leadership that is both motivational and inspirational in order to lead the services business through times of growth and changing business needs (from free to fee). Managed the performance and development of the team, communicating performance expectations and provide regular feedback on performance at a team and individual level.

profile_positions.description: In my role as Director I provided strategic direction and leadership for all aspects of support, network integration and business operations in Asia, with direct oversight responsibilities for its office in Singapore and in Beijing, China. Business operations include P&L responsibility, Business Development, Logistics, and Human Resources. It required direct operations of a regional department delivering Services to end customers as part of the Lucent Worldwide Services organization in Asia. Oversee activities of 6 Technical Managers and 1 Business manager, indirectly supervising staff of 800. The Director is also responsible for short- and long-term revenue growth and profitability of Asian Support Groups. The groups are responsible for delivering high quality services to country teams within the region for all product lines. These products include, but are not limited to Wireless (GSM, CDMA, 3G) and Fixed Wire (Switching, Transmission and Data).
profile_positions.title: Director Customer Services

profile_positions.description:

Key accomplishments:

•	Increased external Cost Recovery from zero to 2.3 MUSD (from free to fee).

Received an Achievement Award for my role in selling the first maintenance contract to Tyco.
